price: A kò pa ìlú kan run rí àfi kí ó ní àkọsílẹ̀ tí A ti mọ̀.
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā walahā kitābun maʿlūmun
